name: Crypto Bollinger RSI Mean Reversion
description: Intraday mean-reversion strategy for BTC/USD and ETH/USD using 20-period Bollinger Bands (±2σ) and 14-period RSI. Opens long when price closes below lower band & RSI<30, short when price closes above upper band & RSI>70. Exits on middle band touch, RSI neutralisation, 1.5 % stop or 2.25 % take-profit. Position size targets 2 % account equity per trade.
